short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily share deals on Pedlar. See https://pedlar.co

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Pedlar extension makes sharing online deals & bargains easy.

Whenever you spot a retailer with a great offer, hit the Pedlar button and it'll automatically open up a new tab and start sharing your deal to Pedlar.

If you've shared a deal from one of our partners you'll earn a commission every time someone buys your deal. You'll be raking it in before you know it!
